name: coder
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who writes computer programs : She became a coder for a large software developer in Seattle.
a person who gives a code (= a system of numbers or letters to identify something) to a piece of information: Medical coders submit information to insurance companies about the treatment patients have received.
More examplesFewer examplesHe's a self-taught coder, having dropped out of college after only a year to start a company.Open-source coders will work hard to fix problems.The validator generates a report from which even the most meticulous coder can benefit.The software requires the coder to input a term before it can produce a list of possible codes from the database.One coder was dismissed after it became clear that her work did not agree with that of other teammates a high number of times.
